Name: Apple
Description: Innovative technology company known for premium consumer electronics, software, and digital services.

Name: Samsung
Description: Global technology conglomerate specializing in electronics, semiconductors, and digital media technologies.

Name: Nike
Description: Leading athletic footwear and apparel company inspiring athletes worldwide with innovative sports products.

Name: Adidas
Description: German multinational corporation designing and manufacturing athletic shoes, clothing, and accessories.

Name: Sony
Description: Japanese multinational conglomerate known for electronics, entertainment, and gaming products.

Name: Microsoft
Description: Technology corporation developing computer software, consumer electronics, and cloud computing services.

Name: Dell
Description: American technology company providing computer hardware, software, and related services worldwide.

Name: HP
Description: Global technology company offering personal computing, printing, and enterprise solutions.

Name: Canon
Description: Japanese multinational corporation specializing in imaging, optical, and industrial products.

Name: Nikon
Description: Japanese multinational corporation specializing in optics, imaging, and precision equipment.
